channel.title: Making a client,
channel.description:
Alright so I absolutely hate leeching and i see taking someone elses client to run a source a friend of mine has worked on as leeching :S sooooooo can anyone help me please please help me to make a client or atleast start me on the right track? it would be apreciated greatly!
thanks burntoath-

item.title: Making a client,
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Burntoath, post:1, topic:339437”]Alright so I absolutely hate leeching and i see taking someone elses client to run a source a friend of mine has worked on as leeching :S sooooooo can anyone help me please please help me to make a client or atleast start me on the right track? it would be apreciated greatly!

thanks burntoath-
Do what the other ppl say, or download a deob, and start off that. it isnt leeching if its a deob.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Making a client,

item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Well, if you’re going to be a complete and arrogant moron, then I suggest going back to fiddling around with RPG-Maker.
